meanings.sent1: The crass behavior of the man at the party offended many guests.
meanings.sent2: It was crass of him to make such rude comments without thinking about others' feelings.
meanings.sent3: The crass way he slurped his soup made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her crass taste in clothing was like a neon sign in a sea of pastels.
meanings.sent5: The crass painting stood out in the gallery, but not in a good way.

meanings.definition: Showing no intelligence or sensitivity; stupid or insensitive
meanings.sent1: The crass decision to ignore safety warnings led to a dangerous situation.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her crass comment as soon as it left her mouth.
meanings.sent3: His crass attempt at a joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: The crass behavior of the bullies made the school environment toxic.
meanings.sent5: The crass mistake cost him the opportunity of a lifetime.
